data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3220190,"name":null,"username":"WicketMaul","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/w/b3f665/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-07-20T19:40:14.976Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eHi all,\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003ewe are trying to utilize our limelight with April tags to go from a current position to a specified position using coordinates. For instance we are using April tag 3 from this year’s game to move to either the right or left to align with the cones. Using pathplanner I inputted the correct coordinates to do so, but it behaves differently with different April tags. For instance, I put the exact same coordinates for April tag 1 and 3, but when I tested them April tag 1 made the robot go left and April tag 3 went right–and at completely different speeds. The other weird thing was when I mirrored the field to account for the blue field, the robot moved as expected–if it was on the red side.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2023-07-20T19:40:14.976Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":7,"reads":81,"readers_count":80,"score":51.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":439091,"topic_slug":"limelight-gotopointcommand-with-april-tags-behaving-unexpectedly","display_username":null,"primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57027,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/limelight-gotopointcommand-with-april-tags-behaving-unexpectedly/439091/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3409567,"name":"system","username":"system","avatar_template":"/uploads/default/original/4X/9/3/2/93234578e69f55873c63fc00fe2d0d85f23bce55.png","created_at":"2024-07-19T19:40:59.138Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThis topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply.
